item.title: Why are NYC apartment prices not falling more?
item.description: Observations: I have an apartment in New York. I don’t currently reside there and will move out when the lease ends (in about a month). Manhattan is a weird place to be right now. We know there’s been something of an exodus from the city. But prices don’t seem to reflect that. Browsing rentals on StreetEasy, I get the sense that prices have fallen slightly Ifrom where they were three months ago – despite New York’s being the epicenter of a pandemic, and therefore:
